titleStmt.title: A new version of the Psalms of David together with all the church-hymns, into metre, smooth, plain and easie to the most ordinary capacities: and yet as close to the original languages, and the last and best English translation, as the nature of such a work will well permit. By Simon Ford, D.D. and rector of Old Swinford in Worcestershire.
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Ford.
titleStmt.author: Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.H. for Brabazon Aylmer, and are to be sold by Sampson Evans bookseller in Worcester,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
